title: Implement Service Provider Self-Registration API
description: Implement a new API endpoint for service provider self-registration that can create a new tenant and user, and associate a subscription plan.

user_stories: As a new service provider, I want to register for the platform with my business details and select a subscription plan.
business_rules: Registration must create a new user account (UserType: Provider).
Registration must create a new tenant account with the provided business details (e.g., tenant id).
The selected subscription plan must be associated with the new tenant.
User email must be unique within the new tenant.
Initial payment processing for paid plans must be handled.
edge_cases: Handling duplicate email within the same tenant.
Managing failed payment processing during registration.
Ensuring transactional consistency for user, tenant, and subscription creation.

acceptance_criteria: New API endpoint `POST /auth/register/provider` is implemented and functional.
A new user (UserType: Provider) is created.
A new tenant is created with the provided business details.
The selected subscription plan is successfully associated with the new tenant.
Initial payment (if applicable) is processed correctly.
Proper error responses are returned for invalid or conflicting data.

endpoints.description: Register a new service provider, including tenant creation and initial subscription.

unit_tests: Validate successful registration with new tenant and free plan.
Validate successful registration with new tenant and paid plan (mock payment).
Test transactional integrity for all associated creations.
integration_tests: End-to-end registration flow with database interactions.
e2e_tests: Simulate service provider registration through UI.

additional_context.technical_notes: Ensure atomic creation of user, tenant, and subscription. Utilize existing services for user, tenant, and subscription management. Implement robust validation for  email uniqueness within a tenant. Integrate with payment processing service for initial billing.
additional_context.security_considerations: Securely handle all registration data. Implement rate limiting to prevent abuse. Ensure proper logging and auditing of registration attempts.
